content:
From now on at night,
I'll be able to look up and see the moon...
I might not be able to resist taking a stroll with my head in the clouds.

The moon rises, the tide falls... there's poetry in everyday life.
How wonderful!
Today, I can finally get a good night's sleep...

The dissipating foam, the slowly rising... moon,
Like a wild and beautiful dream,
This brief experience was more spectacular than my entire life before!

I think...
I'll have sweet dreams tonight~!

I used to live such a structured life,
But today I realized that being a little "wild"
Could bring so much joy!

Though it was a bit risky at times,
thanks to Sani we got to experience such an amazing adventure.
Life is more fun when it's full of surprises and unexpected moments~
